title: The Boy Next Door (film)
summary: The Boy Next Door is a 2015 American erotic thriller film directed by Rob Cohen and written by Barbara Curry and Belle Nuru Dayne. The film stars Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman, and Ian Nelson, with John Corbett and Kristin Chenoweth playing supporting roles. The film follows a 19-year-old man who, after having a one-night stand with his high school teacher, develops a dangerous obsession with her.
